title: Vietnamese Midnight Onboarding Resource for Developers
summary: Midnight lacks structured Vietnamese paths for ZK/privacy contracts and frontend integration. English-only docs create an inefficient onboarding barrier for Vietnamese developers.
solution: Create the first open-access Vietnamese Midnight onboarding curriculum guide users from setup to deployment with clear explanations, examples, and available in PDF, web, GitHub formats
proposer_relevant_experience:
Tung Le Khac Thanh (Eric Le) - Full-Stack Developer

Technical Expertise:

- Midnight Network Development: Hands-on experience building privacy-first DApps on the Midnight Testnet. Skilled in developing Compact smart contracts and implementing client-side ZK proof generation using the Midnight SDK.
- Cardano Development: 1+ years of experience delivering dApps and smart contracts using Aiken, Lucid, and Mesh SDK.
- Non-EVM Development: 2+ years of specialized experience in high-performance chain architecture (Sui, Cosmos, ... ), providing a strong foundation for managing Midnight's unique state model.

Github: [https://github\.com/tung\-lee](https://github.com/tung-lee)



Hien Phan – Developer Documentation Technical Writer

Technical Expertise:

- Technical Writing & Curriculum Design: 2+ years of experience structuring developer documentation and educational curriculums.
- Web3 Localization: Specialized in translating complex blockchain concepts (ZK proofs, Smart Contracts) from English to Vietnamese, ensuring technical accuracy while maintaining readability for the local community.
- Content Strategy: Skilled in breaking down complex engineering tasks into step-by-step tutorials and video scripts

Github: [https://github\.com/hien\-p](https://github.com/hien-p)

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Target Audience

We are targeting Vietnamese software developers, specifically:

- **Web2 Developers:** Full-stack, frontend, and backend engineers (proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript) looking to transition into Web3 but deterred by the complexity of English-only ZK documentation.
- **Existing Web3 Builders:** Vietnamese developers already familiar with basic blockchain concepts who want to master **privacy\-first smart contracts** and **Zero\-Knowledge Proofs \(ZKPs\)** on Midnight.

How We'll Reach Them

We will leverage established, high-engagement local channels to distribute the curriculum and videos directly to the community:

- **Cardano Builder Vietnam:** engaging directly with the most active developer community on Facebook and Telegram.
- **University & Web3 Forums:** Sharing resources in specialized Vietnamese programming groups and student blockchain clubs to capture early talent.

Why this matters for Cardano

Vietnam is consistently ranked among the top countries globally for crypto adoption, yet the language barrier remains a bottleneck for advanced technologies like Midnight.

- **Ecosystem Expansion:** Midnight is a vital partner chain that brings data protection to Cardano. Onboarding Vietnamese developers to Midnight directly expands the capabilities of the wider Cardano ecosystem.
- **Unlocking Talent:** By providing high-quality, native-language education, we turn a "user" base into a "builder" base, enabling Vietnamese developers to create novel, privacy-preserving DApps that add real utility to the network.
- **Grassroots Growth:** Sustainable adoption starts with education. This project ensures that the next generation of Cardano/Midnight applications is built by a diverse, global community.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
1. **Curriculum Design & Structuring:**
    - Mapping out the logical progression from Blockchain Fundamentals to ZK concepts, Compact syntax, and full-stack integration.
    - Defining learning objectives for each module to ensure they meet the needs of Vietnamese developers.
2. **Educational Content Development \(Vietnamese\):**
    - Writing comprehensive, native-language documentation and guides for all modules (Fundamentals, Compact, Integration).
    - Translating complex Midnight/ZKP terminology into clear, understandable Vietnamese technical terms.
3. **Video Production & Editing:**
    - Scripting, recording, and editing video tutorials for every lesson.
    - Adding Vietnamese voiceovers and/or subtitles to ensure maximum accessibility.
4. **Code Engineering & Testing:**
    - Developing and testing open-source Compact smart contract examples
    - Building the full-stack reference DApp (Frontend + Contract) to ensure all code provided to learners is bug-free and deployable.
5. **Platform & Repository Management:**
    - Setting up and maintaining the public GitHub repository with a clean structure.
    - Deploying the Documentation Hub (using MkDocs/Docusaurus/Gitbook) to host the curriculum online.
6. **Project Monitoring & Reporting:**
    - Tracking progress against milestones and acceptance criteria.
    - Producing the final close-out report and establishing the sustainability plan for future maintenance.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
**1. Content Availability & Accessibility**



- **Measure:** All educational materials (Lessons, Guides, Code) must be available from Day 1 in at least three distinct formats: **Web-based Documentation** (Docusaurus/MkDocs), **GitHub Repository** (Markdown/Code), and **Video Tutorials** (YouTube/Platform).

- **Rationale:** Users have different learning styles. Providing text, code, and video ensures maximum reach and lowers the barrier to entry for the material.



**2. Developer Adoption (Traffic & Views)**



- **Measure:** Target **1,000 unique visits** to the documentation hub and **500+ total views** across the video tutorial series within the first 6 months.

- **Rationale:** These metrics indicate real interest and "top-of-funnel" adoption, validating that the content is reaching the target audience of Vietnamese developers.



**3. Active Engagement (GitHub Activity)**



- **Measure:** Generate at least 2**0 interactions** on the GitHub repository, defined as a combination of **Forks**, **Pull Requests** (contributions), or **Issues** (questions/feedback) from the community.

- **Rationale:** Passive reading is not enough for developer tooling. Forks and Issues prove that developers are actually *running* the code, encountering real-world scenarios, and trying to build with the materials provided.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
We propose to develop the first open-access Vietnamese-speaking curriculum for Midnight development, tailored for both beginner and intermediate developers. This structured educational resource will:

- Guide learners step-by-step from environment setup, to writing, testing, and deploying private Compact smart contracts, and finally integrating them with a basic frontend dApp.
- Provide clear technical explanations in Vietnamese, covering Compact language syntax, ZK proof concepts, selective disclosure, and real-world code examples.
- Be available from Day 1 in multiple accessible formats: downloadable PDF, GitHub-hosted markdown, and a user-friendly web version.
- Be released under an open-access license (CC BY 4.0), ensuring all content is free, reusable, and community-maintainable.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Vietnam is a leader in crypto adoption, with nearly 17% of the population using cryptocurrencies. However, existing educational materials for privacy-focused chains are mostly in English, creating a key language barrier. Our project will:

- Bridge the gap by providing a structured Vietnamese learning path to the Midnight/Compact ecosystem.
- Strengthen the local developer ecosystem by enabling Vietnamese speakers to master privacy-first smart contract and dApp development quickly and effectively.
- Help grow Midnight’s adoption in one of its most promising emerging markets, generating new private innovations, tools, and dApps from Vietnamese developers.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Capability & Trust

- **Midnight Specialist:** Our team have hands-on experience building privacy-first DApps on the Midnight Testnet, including developing **Compact smart contracts** and implementing client-side **ZK proof generation** using the Midnight SDK.
- **Cardano Native:** Our team have 1+ years of experience delivering DApps using Aiken, Lucid, and Mesh SDK.
- **Non\-EVM Expertise:** With 2+ years building on high-performance chains like Sui and Cosmos, our team possess the strong architectural foundation needed to master and teach Midnight’s unique state model.

Feasibility Validation

I will validate feasibility through a "Code-First" approach:

1. **Technical Pre\-Validation:** All curriculum code (Contracts & Frontend) will be built and tested against the latest Midnight SDK by me personally before lesson production begins.
2. **Community Feedback:** I will leverage my existing network in the Vietnamese Cardano community to review "Beta" content, ensuring the complex ZK concepts are explained clearly and accurately.

sub_fields.answer: Blockchain Fundamentals & ZKPs Concepts

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
Module 1 (Docs & Video): A consolidated Vietnamese guide and video overview covering Web3 Fundamentals (Blockchain basics, Cryptography, Smart Contracts).



Module 2 (Docs & Video): A dedicated guide and video explainer for Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs) and the Midnight "Rational Privacy" architecture.



GitHub Repository: A public repository initialized with a clear folder structure and README.md.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
The curriculum framework must clearly define the progression: Web3 Foundations → ZKP Theory → Midnight Architecture.



Completion of written guides AND video tutorials (Vietnamese audio/subs) for both Module 1 and Module 2.



GitHub repository must be public, accessible, and explicitly licensed under CC BY-4.0.

sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Public GitHub link showing the initialized repository with populated folders.



Links to the uploaded video tutorials for Modules 1 & 2 (e.g., YouTube playlist).



PDF export of the written curriculum content.

sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
Our proposal is expected to be divided into 4 milestones with the following expected budget:

Total Budget & Costs = $16,000 ~ 40,000 ADA (assuming USD/ADA Rate = 0.4).

- Milestone 1: 12000 ADA
- Milestone 2: 12000 ADA
- Milestone 3: 10000 ADA
- Milestone 4: 6,000 ADA

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: Vietnam is a global leader in crypto adoption. By investing 40000 ADA, this project directly addresses the language barrier that prevents a large segment of Vietnamese Web2 developers from building on Midnight. Providing this structured, high-quality, and open-source learning path in their native language is a high-leverage investment that will immediately unlock new developer talent for the Midnight ecosystem, fostering innovation and contributing to the global decentralization and privacy mission of the project.
